derivation: from the feminine plural of H6913 (קֶבֶר) and H8378 (תַּאֲוָה) with the article interposed; graves of the longing;
outline:
Kibroth-hattaavah = "graves of lust"
  1. a station of Israel in the wilderness 3 campsites away from Sinai near the gulf of Akabah
strongs_def: Kibroth-hat-Taavh, a place in the Desert
